EmailTemplate.name: 7/18 Community Mtg
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: El Barrio es Nuestro Community Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Community Partners,
Below you will find a brief questionnaire regarding your attendance to our next community meeting. Please take a few seconds to fill it out.
Gurney Street beautification project community meeting
Gurney Street y proyectos de embellecimiento
We look forward to your participation.
